title: Ayakashi No Sougiya
alternative_title: あやかしの葬儀屋 ; The Ayakashi Undertakers
status: あやかしの葬儀屋 ; The Ayakashi Undertakers
description:
Description :
        The death of an Ayakashi is unclean - It is an impure occurence that corrodes the land, and occasionally gives birth to monsters. This is the story of the "Ayakashi undertakers" who exorcise these impurities and watch over the deaths of these fantastical beings.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: What Lies Beyond The Clouds
Vol.1 Chapter 1: Jewels From The Mire
